question:
A friend of yours is living in another country. You would like to work in his/her country for a while. Write a letter to your friend and say

– Explain why you would like to work in his/her country
– Describe your skills and experience
– Ask for some information about working in his/her country
text: I hope this letter finds you in radiant health and the best of spirits. I know you've been living in the United States of America since 2019. As you know , I have had  a dream of working in America since  I was a Teenager. Perhaps due to my passion for Interior Designing, I would like to come to your country to get better future scopes in my career.

If we talk about my skills. I'm very well experienced in Autocad, Revit and Google Sketchup. I have 4 years of technical experience working with Khodiyar Design Centre as a Draftsman. Along with that, I do quite of Freelance design for my client in Revit also.

I would like to know the requirements of the job you are currently working at VR Cad. I mean what is the criteria to get an offer from your company to work on a closed work permit. Apart from that what would be the per hour wage for the job.
Hoping to get a response from you soon.
